meanings.definition: A person who is sexually attracted to animals.
meanings.sent1: Some zoophiles seek help to understand their feelings towards animals.
meanings.sent2: It is illegal for zoophiles to engage in sexual activities with animals.
meanings.sent3: The zoophiles at the zoo were admiring the animals a bit too much.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with her pet cat bordered on zoophiles territory.
meanings.sent5: The news article shed light on the secret world of zoophiles.
